TopicTitle: All of my crafts in KSP suddenly disappeared!

Articles.Content:
I was playing KSP career mode on PC and was landing an SSTO on Minmus. Upon landing I returned to the Space Centre to look up contracts. Everything was fine until I went to the tracking station to find that none of my ships were there. They were all gone! I tried to reload but it wouldn't do it. I went into the option menu to find my Alt. F5 saves to reload one of those but they were gone too. So I am basicslly stuck with a complete empty save file with no ships and no past saves or reload option. Does anyone know what I can do to try and restore my save?

Edited August 17, 2016 by WillSpaceMan
Your question has been moved to the Support section. Are you playing on PC, console, or what? More specifics, please?
Is there any chance you filtered out everything? At the top of the map (You have to put your cursor up there to make it drop down) is a filter. It's possible to unclick everything.

5thHorseman

No unfortunately not

Edited August 17, 2016 by WillSpaceMan

No panic!

I managed to fix it, I went into the save file and edited the persistent save to an old save and it all loaded in okay. All of my ships are now back in their correct orbits.

Now I think it is time I landed that base on Duna and get my SSTO back from Minmus!
